title: ReS1:3-4
text: Apply verbal and non-verbal communication and listening skills to interact with others, form and maintain positive relationships, and resolve conflict constructively. (Communication)
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can demonstrate positive verbal and non-verbal communication skills through my words, tone of voice, and body language (incorporate social media).
I can independently apply active listening skills in different situations.
I can apologize in a meaningful way when I have made a mistake (even if it was an accident).
I can brainstorm ways to tell someone when their words or actions are hurtful.
